StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetMudHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OrgId as Int = 0 AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
---SELECT * FROM MUD_HISTORY --- TRUNCATE TABLE MUD_HISTORY
DECLARE @CNT INT, @CntUserLogin VARCHAR(15), @CtrOrgId as int
SET @CNT = 1
--- CREATE TOP 3 HISTORY TABLE /**/ CREATE TABLE #MUD_HISTORY ( [ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [ORG_ID] [int] NOT NULL, [USER_LOGIN] [varchar](15) COLLATE SQL_La.n1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL, [UPDATE_DATE] [date.me] NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]
--- CREATE ENTIRE HISTORY TABLE CREATE TABLE #TEMP_ALL_HISTORY ( ORG_ID INT NULL, MUD_USER_LOGIN VARCHAR(15) NULL, UPDATE_DATE DATETIME NULL )
/*
select * from mud_.le where user_login = 'mcd1mktg' */
WHILE @CNT <= (SELECT COUNT(ORG_ID) FROM MUD_USER_DATA) BEGIN
SET @CntUserLogin = (SELECT MUD_USER_LOGIN FROM MUD_USER_DATA WHERE ID = @CNT) SET @CtrOrgId = (SELECT ORG_ID FROM MUD_USER_DATA WHERE ID = @CNT)
INSERT INTO #TEMP_ALL_HISTORY
SELECT ORG_ID, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE FROM MUD_HISTORY WHERE ORG_ID = @CtrOrgId ---@CntUserLogin ---ORDER BY MF.UPDATE_DATE DESC
UNION
/* SELECT ORG_ID, MUD_USER_LOGIN, QC_DATE FROM MUD_USER_DATA WHERE MUD_USER_LOGIN = @CntUserLogin AND QC_DATE IS NOT NULL ---ORDER BY QC_DATE */
/**/ SELECT TOP 3 ORG_ID, USER_LOGIN, QC_DATE FROM MUD_QC_DATE WHERE USER_LOGIN = @CntUserLogin AND QC_DATE IS NOT NULL
UNION
--- GET MUD FILE UPLOAD LOG DATA SELECT TOP 3 ORG_ID, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE FROM MUD_FILE_UPLOAD_LOG WHERE USER_LOGIN = @CntUserLogin AND UPDATE_DATE IS NOT NULL
--- POPULATE LAST 3 SAVED DATES INSERT INTO #MUD_HISTORY
SELECT TOP 3 ORG_ID, MUD_USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE FROM #TEMP_ALL_HISTORY WHERE ORG_ID = @CtrOrgId ORDER BY UPDATE_DATE DESC
TRUNCATE TABLE #TEMP_ALL_HISTORY
SET @CNT = @CNT + 1 END
--- RETURN DATA IF @OrgId = 0 BEGIN SELECT ORG_ID, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE FROM #MUD_HISTORY WHERE UPDATE_DATE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ORG_ID, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE DESC END ELSE BEGIN SELECT ORG_ID, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE FROM #MUD_HISTORY WHERE ORG_ID = @OrgId AND UPDATE_DATE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ORG_ID, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE DESC END
--- CLEAN UP DROP TABLE #TEMP_ALL_HISTORY DROP TABLE #MUD_HISTORY
SET NOCOUNT OFF
